ARABIC: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What confronts them will be the evil actions which they earned and what they used to mock at will engulf them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the evil of what they had earned would become visible to them; and what they used to mock would surround them from all sides.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The evil consequences of their deeds will become fully apparent to them, and what they had scoffed at will encompass them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Their bad deeds will become public and they will be surrounded by the torment which they had mocked during their worldly life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the evils they earned appeared to them, and the thing they used to mock at descended upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the evils of that which they earned will become apparent to them, and that which they used to mock at will encircle them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the evil (consequences) of what they wrought shall become plain to them, and the very thing they mocked at shall beset them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and there would appear to them die evils of that they have earned, and they would be encompassed by that they mocked at.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the evils that they earned will appear unto them, and that whereat they used to scoff will surround them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the evil of their deeds will become apparent to them, and they will be overwhelmed by that which they used to mock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there shall appear Unto them the evils that they earned, and there shall surround them that whereat they had been mocking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The evils of what they had earned will appear to them, and they will be besieged by what they used to deride.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For the evils of their Deeds will confront them, and they will be (completely) encircled by that which they used to mock at!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the evils of that which they earned will become apparent to them, and they will be encircled by that which they used to mock at!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the evils of their earnings will appear to them, and that which they mocked at will encompass them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There will appear to them the evils of their deeds, and they will be surrounded by what they used to ridicule.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:48] And there will appear to them the evils of what they had earned, and they will be besieged by, there will descend [on them], that which they used to deride, in other words, the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the evils that they earned) their evil works (will appear unto them, and that whereat they used to scoff) the prophets and Scriptures that they used to mock; and it is said the torment that they used to scoff (will surround them) i.e. the torment will visit them.
